00053 static PointerRNA rna_World_lighting_get(PointerRNA *ptr)
00054 {
00055     return rna_pointer_inherit_refine(ptr, &RNA_WorldLighting, ptr->id.data);
00056 }

00068 static void rna_World_mtex_begin(CollectionPropertyIterator *iter, PointerRNA *ptr)
00069 {
00070     World *wo = (World*)ptr->data;
00071     rna_iterator_array_begin(iter, (void*)wo->mtex, sizeof(MTex*), MAX_MTEX, 0, NULL);
00072 }
00073 
00074 static PointerRNA rna_World_active_texture_get(PointerRNA *ptr)
00075 {
00076     World *wo = (World*)ptr->data;
00077     Tex *tex;
00078 
00079     tex = give_current_world_texture(wo);
00080     return rna_pointer_inherit_refine(ptr, &RNA_Texture, tex);
00081 }
00082 
00083 static void rna_World_active_texture_set(PointerRNA *ptr, PointerRNA value)
00084 {
00085     World *wo = (World*)ptr->data;
00086 
00087     set_current_world_texture(wo, value.data);
00088 }
00089 
00090 static void rna_World_update(Main *UNUSED(bmain), Scene *UNUSED(scene), PointerRNA *ptr)
00091 {
00092     World *wo = ptr->id.data;
00093 
00094     DAG_id_tag_update(&wo->id, 0);
00095     WM_main_add_notifier(NC_WORLD, wo);
00096 }
00097 
00098 static void rna_World_draw_update(Main *UNUSED(bmain), Scene *UNUSED(scene), PointerRNA *ptr)
00099 {
00100     World *wo = ptr->id.data;
00101 
00102     DAG_id_tag_update(&wo->id, 0);
00103     WM_main_add_notifier(NC_WORLD|ND_WORLD_DRAW, wo);
00104 }
00105 
00106 /* so camera mist limits redraw */
00107 static void rna_World_draw_mist_update(Main *UNUSED(bmain), Scene *UNUSED(scene), PointerRNA *ptr)
00108 {
00109     World *wo = ptr->id.data;
00110 
00111     DAG_id_tag_update(&wo->id, 0);
00112     WM_main_add_notifier(NC_WORLD|ND_WORLD_DRAW, wo);
00113     WM_main_add_notifier(NC_OBJECT|ND_DRAW, NULL);
00114 }
00115 
00116 static void rna_World_stars_update(Main *UNUSED(bmain), Scene *UNUSED(scene), PointerRNA *ptr)
00117 {
00118     World *wo = ptr->id.data;
00119 
00120     DAG_id_tag_update(&wo->id, 0);
00121     WM_main_add_notifier(NC_WORLD|ND_WORLD_STARS, wo);
00122 }
00123 
00124 static void rna_World_use_nodes_update(Main *bmain, Scene *scene, PointerRNA *ptr)
00125 {
00126     World *wrld = (World*)ptr->data;
00127 
00128     if (wrld->use_nodes && wrld->nodetree == NULL)
00129         ED_node_shader_default(scene, &wrld->id);
00130     
00131     rna_World_update(bmain, scene, ptr);
00132 }

00136 static void rna_def_world_mtex(BlenderRNA *brna)
00137 {
00138     StructRNA *srna;
00139     PropertyRNA *prop;
00140 
00141     static EnumPropertyItem texco_items[] = {
00142         {TEXCO_VIEW, "VIEW", 0, "View", "Use view vector for the texture coordinates"},
00143         {TEXCO_GLOB, "GLOBAL", 0, "Global", "Use global coordinates for the texture coordinates (interior mist)"},
00144         {TEXCO_ANGMAP, "ANGMAP", 0, "AngMap", "Use 360 degree angular coordinates, e.g. for spherical light probes"},
00145         {TEXCO_H_SPHEREMAP, "SPHERE", 0, "Sphere", "For 360 degree panorama sky, spherical mapped, only top half"},
00146         {TEXCO_EQUIRECTMAP, "EQUIRECT", 0, "Equirectangular", "For 360 degree panorama sky, equirectangular mapping"},
00147         {TEXCO_H_TUBEMAP, "TUBE", 0, "Tube", "For 360 degree panorama sky, cylindrical mapped, only top half"},
00148         {TEXCO_OBJECT, "OBJECT", 0, "Object", "Use linked object's coordinates for texture coordinates"},
00149         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00150 
00151     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "WorldTextureSlot", "TextureSlot");
00152     RNA_def_struct_sdna(srna, "MTex");
00153     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "World Texture Slot", "Texture slot for textures in a World datablock");
00154 
00155     /* map to */
00156     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_map_blend", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00157     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "mapto", WOMAP_BLEND);
00158     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Blend", "Affect the color progression of the background");
00159     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00160 
00161     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_map_horizon", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00162     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "mapto", WOMAP_HORIZ);
00163     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Horizon", "Affect the color of the horizon");
00164     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00165 
00166     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_map_zenith_up", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00167     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "mapto", WOMAP_ZENUP);
00168     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Zenith Up", "Affect the color of the zenith above");
00169     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00170 
00171     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_map_zenith_down", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00172     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "mapto", WOMAP_ZENDOWN);
00173     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Zenith Down", "Affect the color of the zenith below");
00174     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00175 
00176     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "texture_coords", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
00177     RNA_def_property_enum_sdna(prop, NULL, "texco");
00178     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, texco_items);
00179     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Texture Coordinates",
00180                              "Texture coordinates used to map the texture onto the background");
00181     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00182 
00183     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "object", PROP_POINTER, PROP_NONE);
00184     RNA_def_property_pointer_sdna(prop, NULL, "object");
00185     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "Object");
00186     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_EDITABLE);
00187     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Object", "Object to use for mapping with Object texture coordinates");
00188     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00189 
00190     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "blend_factor", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00191     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "blendfac");
00192     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 0, 1, 10, 3);
00193     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Blend Factor", "Amount texture affects color progression of the background");
00194     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00195 
00196     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "horizon_factor", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00197     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "colfac");
00198     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 0, 1, 10, 3);
00199     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Horizon Factor", "Amount texture affects color of the horizon");
00200     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00201 
00202     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "zenith_up_factor", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00203     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "zenupfac");
00204     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 0, 1, 10, 3);
00205     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Zenith Up Factor", "Amount texture affects color of the zenith above");
00206     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00207 
00208     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "zenith_down_factor", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00209     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "zendownfac");
00210     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 0, 1, 10, 3);
00211     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Zenith Down Factor", "Amount texture affects color of the zenith below");
00212     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00213 }
00214 
00215 static void rna_def_lighting(BlenderRNA *brna)
00216 {
00217     StructRNA *srna;
00218     PropertyRNA *prop;
00219 
00220     static EnumPropertyItem blend_mode_items[] = {
00221         {WO_AOMUL, "MULTIPLY", 0, "Multiply", "Multiply direct lighting with ambient occlusion, darkening the result"},
00222         {WO_AOADD, "ADD", 0, "Add", "Add light and shadow"},
00223         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00224 
00225     static EnumPropertyItem prop_color_items[] = {
00226         {WO_AOPLAIN, "PLAIN", 0, "White", "Plain diffuse energy (white.)"},
00227         {WO_AOSKYCOL, "SKY_COLOR", 0, "Sky Color", "Use horizon and zenith color for diffuse energy"},
00228         {WO_AOSKYTEX, "SKY_TEXTURE", 0, "Sky Texture", "Does full Sky texture render for diffuse energy"},
00229         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00230 
00231     static EnumPropertyItem prop_sample_method_items[] = {
00232         {WO_AOSAMP_CONSTANT, "CONSTANT_JITTERED", 0, "Constant Jittered", "Fastest and gives the most noise"},
00233         {WO_AOSAMP_HALTON, "ADAPTIVE_QMC", 0, "Adaptive QMC", "Fast in high-contrast areas"},
00234         {WO_AOSAMP_HAMMERSLEY, "CONSTANT_QMC", 0, "Constant QMC", "Best quality"},
00235         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00236 
00237     static EnumPropertyItem prop_gather_method_items[] = {
00238         {WO_AOGATHER_RAYTRACE, "RAYTRACE", 0, "Raytrace", "Accurate, but slow when noise-free results are required"},
00239         {WO_AOGATHER_APPROX, "APPROXIMATE", 0, "Approximate", "Inaccurate, but faster and without noise"},
00240         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00241 
00242     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "WorldLighting", NULL);
00243     RNA_def_struct_sdna(srna, "World");
00244     RNA_def_struct_nested(brna, srna, "World");
00245     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Lighting", "Lighting for a World datablock");
00246 
00247     /* ambient occlusion */
00248     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_ambient_occlusion", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00249     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "mode", WO_AMB_OCC);
00250     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Use Ambient Occlusion",
00251                              "Use Ambient Occlusion to add shadowing based on distance between objects");
00252     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00253 
00254     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "ao_factor", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_FACTOR);
00255     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "aoenergy");
00256     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0, INT_MAX);
00257     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 0, 1, 0.1, 2);
00258     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Factor", "Factor for ambient occlusion blending");
00259     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00260 
00261     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "ao_blend_type", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
00262     RNA_def_property_enum_sdna(prop, NULL, "aomix");
00263     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, blend_mode_items);
00264     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Blend Mode", "Defines how AO mixes with material shading");
00265     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00266 
00267     /* environment lighting */
00268     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_environment_light", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00269     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "mode", WO_ENV_LIGHT);
00270     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Use Environment Lighting", "Add light coming from the environment");
00271     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00272 
00273     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "environment_energy", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00274     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "ao_env_energy");
00275     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 0, FLT_MAX, 1, 3);
00276     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Environment Color", "Defines the strength of environment light");
00277     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00278 
00279     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "environment_color", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
00280     RNA_def_property_enum_sdna(prop, NULL, "aocolor");
00281     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, prop_color_items);
00282     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Environment Color", "Defines where the color of the environment light comes from");
00283     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00284 
00285     /* indirect lighting */
00286     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_indirect_light", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00287     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "mode", WO_INDIRECT_LIGHT);
00288     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Use Indirect Lighting", "Add indirect light bouncing of surrounding objects");
00289     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00290 
00291     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "indirect_factor", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_FACTOR);
00292     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "ao_indirect_energy");
00293     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0, INT_MAX);
00294     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 0, 1, 0.1, 2);
00295     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Indirect Factor", "Factor for how much surrounding objects contribute to light");
00296     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00297 
00298     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "indirect_bounces", PROP_INT, PROP_UNSIGNED);
00299     RNA_def_property_int_sdna(prop, NULL, "ao_indirect_bounces");
00300     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 1, SHRT_MAX);
00301     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Bounces", "Number of indirect diffuse light bounces");
00302     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00303 
00304     /* gathering parameters */
00305     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "gather_method", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
00306     RNA_def_property_enum_sdna(prop, NULL, "ao_gather_method");
00307     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, prop_gather_method_items);
00308     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Gather Method", "");
00309     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00310 
00311     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "passes", PROP_INT, PROP_NONE);
00312     RNA_def_property_int_sdna(prop, NULL, "ao_approx_passes");
00313     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0, 10);
00314     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Passes", "Number of preprocessing passes to reduce overocclusion");
00315     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00316 
00317     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "distance", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_DISTANCE);
00318     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "aodist");
00319     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Distance",
00320                              "Length of rays, defines how far away other faces give occlusion effect");
00321     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00322 
00323     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "falloff_strength", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00324     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "aodistfac");
00325     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Strength",
00326                              "Attenuation falloff strength, the higher, the less influence distant objects have");
00327     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00328 
00329     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "bias", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00330     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "aobias");
00331     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0, 0.5);
00332     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Bias",
00333                              "Bias (in radians) to prevent smoothed faces from showing banding "
00334                              "(for Raytrace Constant Jittered)");
00335     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00336 
00337     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "threshold", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00338     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "ao_adapt_thresh");
00339     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0, 1);
00340     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Threshold",
00341                              "Samples below this threshold will be considered fully shadowed/unshadowed and skipped "
00342                              "(for Raytrace Adaptive QMC)");
00343     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00344 
00345     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "adapt_to_speed", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00346     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "ao_adapt_speed_fac");
00347     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0, 1);
00348     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Adapt To Speed",
00349                              "Use the speed vector pass to reduce AO samples in fast moving pixels - "
00350                              "higher values result in more aggressive sample reduction "
00351                              "(requires Vec pass enabled, for Raytrace Adaptive QMC)");
00352     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00353 
00354     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "error_threshold", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00355     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "ao_approx_error");
00356     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0001, 10);
00357     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Error Tolerance", "Low values are slower and higher quality");
00358     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00359 
00360     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "correction", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00361     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "ao_approx_correction");
00362     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0, 1);
00363     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 0, 1, 0.1, 2);
00364     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Correction", "Ad-hoc correction for over-occlusion due to the approximation");
00365     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00366 
00367     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_falloff", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00368     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "aomode", WO_AODIST);
00369     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Falloff", "Distance will be used to attenuate shadows");
00370     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00371 
00372     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_cache", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00373     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "aomode", WO_AOCACHE);
00374     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Pixel Cache",
00375                              "Cache AO results in pixels and interpolate over neighboring pixels for speedup");
00376     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00377 
00378     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "samples", PROP_INT, PROP_NONE);
00379     RNA_def_property_int_sdna(prop, NULL, "aosamp");
00380     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 1, 128);
00381     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Samples",
00382                              "Amount of ray samples. Higher values give smoother results and longer rendering times");
00383     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00384 
00385     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "sample_method", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
00386     RNA_def_property_enum_sdna(prop, NULL, "ao_samp_method");
00387     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, prop_sample_method_items);
00388     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Sample Method", "Method for generating shadow samples (for Raytrace)");
00389     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00390 }
00391 
00392 static void rna_def_world_mist(BlenderRNA *brna)
00393 {
00394     StructRNA *srna;
00395     PropertyRNA *prop;
00396     
00397     static EnumPropertyItem falloff_items[] = {
00398         {0, "QUADRATIC", 0, "Quadratic", "Use quadratic progression"},
00399         {1, "LINEAR", 0, "Linear", "Use linear progression"},
00400         {2, "INVERSE_QUADRATIC", 0, "Inverse Quadratic", "Use inverse quadratic progression"},
00401         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00402 
00403     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "WorldMistSettings", NULL);
00404     RNA_def_struct_sdna(srna, "World");
00405     RNA_def_struct_nested(brna, srna, "World");
00406     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "World Mist", "Mist settings for a World data-block");
00407 
00408     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_mist", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00409     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "mode", WO_MIST);
00410     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Use Mist", "Occlude objects with the environment color as they are further away");
00411     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_draw_update");
00412 
00413     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "intensity", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00414     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "misi");
00415     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0, 1);
00416     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Minimum", "Overall minimum intensity of the mist effect");
00417     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00418 
00419     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "start", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_DISTANCE);
00420     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "miststa");
00421     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0, FLT_MAX);
00422     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 0, 10000, 10, 2);
00423     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Start", "Starting distance of the mist, measured from the camera");
00424     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_draw_mist_update");
00425 
00426     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "depth", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_DISTANCE);
00427     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "mistdist");
00428     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0, FLT_MAX);
00429     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 0, 10000, 10, 2);
00430     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Depth", "Distance over which the mist effect fades in");
00431     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_draw_mist_update");
00432 
00433     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "height", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_DISTANCE);
00434     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "misthi");
00435     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0, 100);
00436     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Height", "Control how much mist density decreases with height");
00437     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00438     
00439     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "falloff", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
00440     RNA_def_property_enum_sdna(prop, NULL, "mistype");
00441     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, falloff_items);
00442     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Falloff", "Type of transition used to fade mist");
00443     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00444 }

00446 static void rna_def_world_stars(BlenderRNA *brna)
00447 {
00448     StructRNA *srna;
00449     PropertyRNA *prop;
00450 
00451     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "WorldStarsSettings", NULL);
00452     RNA_def_struct_sdna(srna, "World");
00453     RNA_def_struct_nested(brna, srna, "World");
00454     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "World Stars", "Stars settings for a World data-block");
00455 
00456     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_stars", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00457     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "mode", WO_STARS);
00458     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Use Stars", "Enable starfield generation");
00459     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_stars_update");
00460 
00461     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "size", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00462     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "starsize");
00463     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0, 10);
00464     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Size", "Average screen dimension of stars");
00465     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_draw_update"); /* use normal update since this isn't visualized */
00466 
00467     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "distance_min", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_DISTANCE);
00468     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "starmindist");
00469     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0, 1000);
00470     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Minimum Distance", "Minimum distance to the camera for stars");
00471     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_stars_update");
00472 
00473     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "average_separation", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00474     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "stardist");
00475     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 2, 1000);
00476     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Average Separation", "Average distance between any two stars");
00477     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_stars_update");
00478 
00479     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "color_random", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00480     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "starcolnoise");
00481     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0, 1);
00482     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Color Randomization", "Randomize star colors");

00486 void RNA_def_world(BlenderRNA *brna)
00487 {
00488     StructRNA *srna;
00489     PropertyRNA *prop;
00490 
00491 #if 0
00492     static EnumPropertyItem physics_engine_items[] = {
00493         {WOPHY_NONE, "NONE", 0, "None", ""},
00494         /*{WOPHY_ENJI, "ENJI", 0, "Enji", ""}, */
00495         /*{WOPHY_SUMO, "SUMO", 0, "Sumo (Deprecated)", ""}, */
00496         /*{WOPHY_DYNAMO, "DYNAMO", 0, "Dynamo", ""}, */
00497         /*{WOPHY_ODE, "ODE", 0, "ODE", ""}, */
00498         {WOPHY_BULLET, "BULLET", 0, "Bullet", ""},
00499         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00500 #endif
00501 
00502     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "World", "ID");
00503     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "World",
00504                            "World datablock describing the environment and ambient lighting of a scene");
00505     RNA_def_struct_ui_icon(srna, ICON_WORLD_DATA);
00506 
00507     rna_def_animdata_common(srna);
00508     rna_def_mtex_common(brna, srna, "rna_World_mtex_begin", "rna_World_active_texture_get",
00509         "rna_World_active_texture_set", NULL, "WorldTextureSlot", "WorldTextureSlots", "rna_World_update");
00510 
00511     /* colors */
00512     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "horizon_color", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_COLOR);
00513     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "horr");
00514     RNA_def_property_array(prop, 3);
00515     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Horizon Color", "Color at the horizon");
00516     /* RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update"); */
00517     /* render-only uses this */
00518     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_WORLD|ND_WORLD_DRAW, "rna_World_update");
00519 
00520     
00521     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "zenith_color", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_COLOR);
00522     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "zenr");
00523     RNA_def_property_array(prop, 3);
00524     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Zenith Color", "Color at the zenith");
00525     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00526

00528     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "ambr");
00529     RNA_def_property_array(prop, 3);
00530     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Ambient Color", "Ambient color of the world");
00531     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00532 
00533     /* exp, range */
00534     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "exposure", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00535     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "exp");
00536     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0, 1.0);
00537     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Exposure", "Amount of exponential color correction for light");
00538     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00539

00543     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Range", "The color range that will be mapped to 0-1");
00544     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00545 
00546     /* sky type */

00548     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "skytype", WO_SKYBLEND);
00549     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Blend Sky", "Render background with natural progression from horizon to zenith");
00550     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00551 
00552     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_sky_paper", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00553     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "skytype", WO_SKYPAPER);
00554     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Paper Sky", "Flatten blend or texture coordinates");
00555     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00556 
00557     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_sky_real", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00558     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "skytype", WO_SKYREAL);
00559     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Real Sky", "Render background with a real horizon, relative to the camera angle");
00560     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_update");
00561 
00562     /* nested structs */
00563     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "light_settings", PROP_POINTER, PROP_NONE);
00564     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_NEVER_NULL);
00565     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "WorldLighting");
00566     RNA_def_property_pointer_funcs(prop, "rna_World_lighting_get", NULL, NULL, NULL);
00567     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Lighting", "World lighting settings");
00568 
00569     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "mist_settings", PROP_POINTER, PROP_NONE);
00570     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_NEVER_NULL);
00571     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "WorldMistSettings");
00572     RNA_def_property_pointer_funcs(prop, "rna_World_mist_get", NULL, NULL, NULL);
00573     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Mist", "World mist settings");
00574 
00575     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "star_settings", PROP_POINTER, PROP_NONE);
00576     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_NEVER_NULL);
00577     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "WorldStarsSettings");
00578     RNA_def_property_pointer_funcs(prop, "rna_World_stars_get", NULL, NULL, NULL);
00579     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Stars", "World stars settings");
00580 
00581     /* nodes */
00582     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "node_tree", PROP_POINTER, PROP_NONE);
00583     RNA_def_property_pointer_sdna(prop, NULL, "nodetree");
00584     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Node Tree", "Node tree for node based worlds");
00585 
00586     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_nodes", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00587     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "use_nodes", 1);
00588     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_ANIMATABLE);
00589     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Use Nodes", "Use shader nodes to render the world");
00590     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_World_use_nodes_update");
00591 
00592     rna_def_lighting(brna);
00593     rna_def_world_mist(brna);
00594     rna_def_world_stars(brna);
00595     rna_def_world_mtex(brna);
00596 }
